msg.gridpattern: Grid set to %d X blocks, %d Z blocks.
msg.biomepatternbad: '%s' ist not a valid search pattern
grid.config.tt.blockcolor: The color that square /grid blocks markers will be shown in
grid.config.tt.linecolor: The color that /grid line lines and hexes will be shown in
grid.config.tt.circlecolor: The color that /grid circles will be shown in
grid.config.tt.spawnNightcolor: The color that night spawns will be shown in
grid.config.tt.spawnDaycolor: The color that everytime spawns will be shown in
grid.config.tt.biomecolor: The color that biome markers will be shown in
grid.config.cacheupdateseconds: Update time in seconds for spawns and biomes
grid.config.tt.cacheupdateseconds: Set this to 0 to see changes immediately, at the expense of frame rate. Higher values increase frame rate but will take a bit to display changes.
